hero_section.welcome_message: Welcome to the Trondheim Hungarian Club website!

friendship.title: Making New Friendships
friendship.description: Meet new people in the Hungarian community.

networking.title: Networking
networking.description: Stay in touch with old and new friends.

learning.title: Learning Together
learning.description: Learn together with others, share your knowledge and experience.

entertainment.title: Entertainment
entertainment.description: Participate in various cultural and community events.

about_us.title: About Us
about_us.description: The Trondheim Hungarian Club is a unique community where the love of Hungarian culture and language connects the Hungarians living here. Our goal is to create a friendly and supportive community where everyone can feel at home.

event_calendar.title: Event Calendar
event_calendar.description: View all upcoming events in our calendar!
